PAPIER-MACHE HOOKAH.

Blend your interiors with festive seasons and decorate your shelves with a beautifully designed decor piece miniature hookahs , inspired from the rich traditions of Kashmir. Crafted in Kashmiri Paper Mache, the piece makes you want to decorate your homes and gets you festive ready. capture your home in its traditional looks.

Material:
    Papier-Mache and Brass.
Care:
    Dust it with a soft cotton cloth to keep away the dirt.
Usage:
    Use it as a piece of classic decor and let it inspire a classy statement for your abode.
Shipping Info:
    Dispatched in a maximum of 6 business days

Related Products

PAPIER-MACHE HANGING BELLS.

PAPIER-MACHE HANGING BELLS.

These bells are made by skilled Papier-Mache artisans of the Valley, who put their heart into first making its mashed paper mould, then hardening it and finally breathing a new life into it.The bells can be used as a piece of shelf decor or hung from a hook for them to sway across your home.

PAPIER-MACHE SANTA.

PAPIER-MACHE SANTA.

Dashing through the snow comes a Santa his bag full of gifts to spread merry among the children. The symbolic Santa Claus has been handcrafted by Kashmiri Paper Mache artists who make these Santa’s from remnants of waste paper, transforming them into a piece of luxury to be cherished. Bring home the magic of Santa Claus all the way from Kashmir and spread a glorious mirth throughout your home.

View Product Details

DECORATIVE PAPIER-MACHE HANGINGS.

DECORATIVE PAPIER-MACHE HANGINGS.

Kashmir Paper-Mache is a handicraft involving the transformation of paper pulp into intricately decorated artefacts such as Papier-Mache boxes, bowls, elephant models, cups and numerous other handy objects. These colourful hanging items comes in the shape of an cate, elephants, camels, horses, birds etc they come together to form a beautiful set which sways across your home. These hangings uses a material of mashed and hardened waste paper. The items are crafted in a fun mix of colours and within the realms of Kashmiri Paper Mache. This is achieved by magical hands which later lends its charm to your living space.
